text: "Another Park, Another Sunday" is a 1974 song by The Doobie Brothers and is the leading single from their fourth studio album What Were Once Vices Are Now Habits. It went to number 32 in the United States and was later included on their greatest hits album The Very Best of the Doobie Brothers. The B-side of the single Black Water became their first one single in the United States and received more airplay. ==Track listing== # "Another Park, Another Sunday" (Tom Johnston) – 4:27 # "Black Water" (Patrick Simmons) – 4:15 ==References== Category:1974 songs Category:Rock songs Category:The Doobie Brothers songs
title: Another Park, Another Sunday
